title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 10th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Trump 2020 Senior Campaign Advisor Lara Trump about the two important Congressional races happening in North Carolina.

Todd speaks with "The Activist Mommy" Elizabeth Johnston about the culture issues discussed in Todd's book "Culture Jihad."

Todd speaks with Focus on the Family President Jim Daly about the controversy over NFL quarterback Drew Brees' support of "Bring Your Bible To School Day."
